roleset.name: aesthetically/sensorially pleasing

role.descr: instrument, aspect of arg1 that is beautiful

roles.note: Does not include the arg0 from the verb

example.name: both args
example.text: The lawn was beautiful with hidden treasures, like this orchid.
example.arg: with hidden treasures, like this orchid

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, beautify.01.
